a.title: Logical Model for representing Generic Personas from a DAK. Depiction of the human and system actors. Human actors are end users, supervisors and related stakeholders who would be interacting with the digital system or involved in the clinical care, public health or health system pathway.

tr.td:
ISCO Code
Binding: ISCO-08 Value Set (extensible)

description.value: Logical Model for representing Generic Personas from a DAK. Depiction of the human and system actors. Human actors are end users, supervisors and related stakeholders who would be interacting with the digital system or involved in the clinical care, public health or health system pathway.

definition.value: Logical Model for representing Generic Personas from a DAK. Depiction of the human and system actors. Human actors are end users, supervisors and related stakeholders who would be interacting with the digital system or involved in the clinical care, public health or health system pathway.
Other names or examples for the persona
